body:
In Pyro we usually treat `Categorical` variables as one-hot float vectors. It's a little easier to create a one-hot vector from a `torch.LongTensor`, since [you can](https://github.com/uber/pyro/blob/dev/pyro/distributions/categorical.py#L117)
```py
sample = torch.multinomial(probs, 1, replacement=True)
one_hot = torch.zeros_like(probs).scatter_(-1, sample, 1)
```
